articles.author: Denny Jacob
articles.title: Tesla Plans 3-for-1 Stock Split, Joining Other Big Tech Companies - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: America’s largest auto maker by market value—which enacted a 5-for-1 stock split almost two years ago—seeks to make the shares more accessible to individual investors.

articles.title: US inflation skyrockets, piling pressure on Biden - news.com.au
articles.description: US inflation surged to a new four-decade high in May, defying hopes that price pressures had peaked and deepening President Joe Biden's political troubles as Americans struggle to meet the cost of essentials like food and gas.
articles.content: US President Joe Biden is struggling to help ease surging prices hurting American familes and damaging his popularityUS inflation surged to a new four-decade high in May, defying hopes that price pre… [+2876 chars]

articles.author: Ashley Armstrong
articles.title: India's richest man tables £5bn joint bid for Boots - The Times
articles.description: The Indian company Reliance Industries and the American private equity firm Apollo have made a £5.5 billion bid for Boots in a deal that would enable its US parent company to keep a stake of about 30 per cent.The joint bidders emerged as the frontrunners for …
